text: Bingeing report. I watched Band of Brothers all the way through. It's good, but I had forgotten how bloody it is. Since I was in that mode, I watched All Quiet on the Western Front on Netflix. Same idea, with 2020's production, a different war, and from the other side. I think the next thing will be They Shall Not Grow Old on HBO. I think an AI could have plotted this path for me.
